name: Online Mahjong Solitaire
description:
Free Online Mahjong Solitaire.

The Chinese game for children "Demolish the Tile Turtle" is a base of online mahjong solitaire game. In this game, you need to disassemble the turtle.

The level consists of tiles construction. Your goal is to disassemble the whole structure. From there, you can take two identical or equivalent tiles. You are allowed to take the unlocked tiles only. A tile that is not overlapping with another tile from above and where the left or right side does not touch the adjacent tile, is called a non-blocked or open tile. If the tile is blocked from above or to the left or right, you cannot use it to remove it from the construction.

During the game you will see a calendar where each day represents a new level. You have access to the levels for the current day only. In one week we add 7 new exclusive mahjong solitaire levels.
